boat.name: High Barbaree
boat.full_description:
High Barbaree was built in 2001, and purchased by her current owners in Holland in 2002 after chartering to discover if she was the real dream boat. They cruised Holland and sailed back to the East Coast of England in 2003. She took part in the East Coast Classics in 2003 and brest and Douarenez festivals in 2004 and 2008. In 2005 they joined the East Coast Classics and the VKSJ rally in Hellevoetsluis on the way to Stockholm where she overwintered. In 2006 she cruised to the Aland Islands, Finland, Estonia, Latvia and joined the Cruising Association raly in Riga. She came home via Sweden, North Germany, Denmark and the Kiel Canal. In 2010 she cruised to the Isles of Scilly, attended Seafair Haven in Milford Haven and briefly visited Ireland.

In 2013, High Barbaree took part in the OGA Round Britain Challenge. Reports may be found on Sailing by.
boat.short_description: High Barbaree was built in 2001 and has cruised extensively since then in the Netherlands, Baltic and France from a base on the English East Coast then the Solent. She participated in the OGA Round Britain Challenge in 2013.
